There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around April 20th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailstwo triangle craft roughly the size of a private jet with 3 lights per craft each light at the tip of every point of the triangle. the craft shape was elongated not symmetrical both craft were in santa monica, corner of 9th and montana at 8:30 pm 20th april 2011 flying east away from santa monica beach toward downtown los angeles. they were silent and eerie to observe, as the moon is fairly big and the sky wasn���t very dark i got a good look at the two albeit a short amount of time. the craft were clearly not the usual craft seen around the area, as there is a airport in santa monica, they were both flying low altitude, they were not flying exactly side by side, the second craft was at 5oclock from the first but the same speed. i would put the speed at roughly 50-60 mph.. attached is a photo sourced from this site *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). the second attached photo is sourced from google and is a accurate representation of the shape and size the description is very accurate to what i saw, the photo does not show the definition that i can provide if need be.
Summary: two triangle craft roughly the size of a private jet with 3 lights per craft each light at the tip of every point of the crafts tips. the craft shape was elongated not symmetrical
